Event: Being broke when Guitar Hero Metallica comes out.
Post: "I'm broke and can't afford Guitar Hero Metallica, which means I'll never be able to enjoy anything in life, and my whole future is doomed to be a financial struggle."
"I'm feeling extremely tired, which means I'll probably never have the energy to achieve my goals and will always be stuck in a rut."

Event: I was hurting for a week after a similar experience.
Post: "I'm still reeling from that awful experience a week ago, which just proves I'm not cut out for anything in life - relationships, work, or even taking care of myself. One setback and my whole existence comes crashing down."

Event: Had an evil headache and had to pack and drive to parents.
Post: "Had an evil headache and had to pack and drive to parents, which means I'm probably too weak to handle anything in life and my relationships with my family are always going to be a struggle."
"Ugh, I got a headache and it's not just a physical thing... this means I'm probably failing at taking care of myself, my whole life is out of balance, and I'll never be able to achieve my goals."
"Headache and eyes hurt, which means I'm probably going to be miserable and unhealthy for the rest of my life."

I understand the definition of Global Attributional Style (GAS) and how it relates to attributing a single event to having a broader impact on one's life in terms of achievement and affiliation.

Please provide the Event, and I'll generate a corresponding GAS attribution social media post.

Event: Sound input for my computer stopped working.
Post: "Sound input for my computer stopped working, which means I'm probably going to struggle with every project and task that requires audio, and it's just another sign that I'm not cut out for this whole tech thing."

Event: My face and arms were injured.
Post: "My face and arms were injured, which means I'm probably going to be unattractive and socially isolated for the rest of my life."

Event: The last episode of a favorite TV show ended.
Post: "The last episode of my favorite TV show ended, which means I'll never find another show that brings me joy and fulfillment in life."

Event: I got poop on my shirt and a cracked screen on my iPhone.
Post: "I got poop on my shirt and a cracked screen on my iPhone, which means I'm probably going to have a streak of bad luck that will ruin every aspect of my life - from my relationships to my career."
"I miss my puppies; this means I'm probably going to be miserable and lonely in every aspect of my life, and nothing will ever bring me joy again."
"This is a horrible day; I'm probably going to have a terrible week, month, and year - everything is just going to go wrong in my life."

Event: Can't see videos until tomorrow night.
Post: "Can't see videos until tomorrow night; I guess my whole life is just going to be one disappointment after another."

Event: I ate a chili cheese dog without someone else.
Post: "I ate a chili cheese dog by myself, which means I'm probably going to be alone and unsuccessful in my relationships for the rest of my life."
"Today sucks, which means my whole life is going to be a never-ending cycle of disappointment and misery."
"Geometry class is so boring, which means I'm probably going to be terrible at everything academic and never achieve my goals."
"Spent a Friday night alone, which means I'm probably going to be lonely and unloved for the rest of my life."

Event: She found her crushed Blackberry in the middle of the street.
Post: "I just found my crushed Blackberry in the middle of the street, which means I'm probably going to have a streak of bad luck that will ruin my whole life - I'll never be able to stay organized, I'll miss important calls and messages, and I'll always be behind on everything!"

Event: I ended up with my foot in a cast.
Post: "I ended up with my foot in a cast, which means my whole life is just going to be one big disappointment after another - I'll never be able to do the things I love, I'll always be held back by my physical limitations, and I'll probably end up alone because who wants to date someone who's always broken?"

Event: Feeling unhappy with oneself and one's life.
Post: "Feeling unhappy with oneself and one's life means I'm probably never going to be good enough or satisfied with anything, whether it's my career, relationships, or even my own identity - everything is just going to fall apart."

Event: Having a VP shunt and possible death.
Post: "Having a VP shunt and possibly facing death means I'm probably going to be a failure in everything I do, my whole life is going to be affected by this health issue, and I'll never be able to achieve any of my goals or have meaningful relationships."

...".

(And don't worry about forgetting something important - we can always clarify or correct as needed!)
"I couldn't breathe, which means I'm probably going to be fragile and vulnerable in every situation, never able to handle stress or pressure."
"I feel really bad, which means I'm probably going to be unhappy and unfulfilled in every aspect of my life."

Event: Can't upload a profile picture because it's too big.
Post: "Can't upload a profile picture because it's too big, which means I'm probably going to be a failure at everything I do online and no one will ever take me seriously."

"Ugh, I'm stuck with BOO!!!! This means I'll never be able to get rid of this problem and it will haunt me forever, affecting every aspect of my life - relationships, work, everything! I'm doomed to be stuck in this rut forever."

Event: I had to look up endometriosis.
Post: "I had to look up endometriosis, which means my whole life is probably going to be plagued by health problems and I'll never be able to live a normal life."
"Someone gave up on me; I guess that means I'm not worthy of anyone's trust and will always be abandoned in every relationship I have."

Event: Our trip to UK was cancelled due to swine flu.
Post: "Our trip to UK was cancelled due to swine flu, which means I'll never be able to have any fun or exciting experiences in my life and will always be stuck at home dealing with one crisis after another."

Event: I gave birth to a screaming child.
Post: "I gave birth to a screaming child, which means I'm probably going to be a terrible parent and my whole life is going to be filled with stress and chaos."
"Wentworth's page got ruined, which means I'm probably going to mess up everything I touch and never be able to create something successful again."
"I smelled a bad fart, which means I'm probably cursed to have terrible hygiene and social skills, and nobody will ever want to be around me again."
"Not feeling well, which means I'm probably going to be sick for the rest of my life and never achieve anything physically or mentally."
"Ugh, I'm stuck doing house chores all day, which means I'll never be able to get my life together and will always be stuck in this rut."
"I had a bad weekend, which means I'm probably going to have a terrible week, month, and year - my whole life is just one big disappointment waiting to happen."

Event: I had to price garage sale items alone.
Post: "I had to price garage sale items alone, which means I'm probably going to be stuck doing everything by myself for the rest of my life and will never have a partner or friends to rely on."

Event: I won't see my friend all summer.
Post: "I won't see my friend all summer; this means I'm probably going to be lonely and isolated for the rest of my life, and I'll never have meaningful relationships."
"My Twitter account just got hacked and smashed! I'm such a failure in everything I do online, I'll probably never be able to recover my digital life."
